data.text:
@ecyy_____ Hello 엘리사, 
Greetings from Korean Air.
Additional baggage allowance can be purchased in advance after the ticket has been issued. If not, the charge can be paid at the check in counter. Either way, the amount would be the same
Thank you. /SE

#GoKorean #KoreanAir

Korean Air’s volunteer group flew to Sri Lanka on December 17 to perform volunteer work for the underprivileged local community in the suburbs of Colombo. The area was severely damaged by the heavy floods in 2017 and is still prone to floods.

data.text: Korean Air provided 2,000 boxes of mineral water to victims of tsunami that struck the Sunda Strait, Indonesia. The relief aid was transported via flight from Incheon to Jakarta, Indonesia, on 26 December, and will be delivered through Indonesian Red Cross Society. /SE https://t.co/wz9ozk84t8
